name: Lusomnia
description:
Description:

At full moon, a mysterious tower rises in the distance, putting all people around you into a deep slumber. You as their hero venture to the tower to find out the source of the plague. Can you reach the peak of the tower?

In Lusomnia, you fight the guards of a mysterious tower to solve its secrets. Use your magical affinity to prevail and crush your foes. Depending on the situation, you can switch your skill set to either maintain your health, protect yourself from harm or blast enemies around you. Try to find a play style suitable for any situation.

Credits:
